Description: Fragment of flattened handle from a Thasian pottery transport amphora. Clay near fine red-brown; little mica. Rectangular stamp at top of handle with Greek inscription and pilos and perhaps axe symbols.
Curator's comments: Name Telemachos. Petrie diary, 1884-1885 (EES Archive XVII 47), p. 102, 11. For the date see Ch.Tzochev, Archaeologia Bulgarica 13 (2009) 65.
Bibliographic references: Villing et al 2013-2015 / Naukratis: Greeks in Egypt (JB.0022)
